title: It-that 강조구문 응용
description: It-that 강조구문을 다양한 시제와 결합하여 특정 요소를 강조합니다. IT-CLEFT-EMPHASIS-ADVANCED 패턴을 연습합니다.
examples: It was John that broke the vase.
It is next year that we will launch the product.
It was through hard work that they achieved success.
learning_points: 시제와 결합된 강조구문을 통한 핵심 요소 부각

sentences.en: It was John that broke the vase.
It is next year that we will launch the product.

sentences.kr: 그들이 성공을 달성한 것은 바로 노력을 통해서였습니다.
sentences.en: It was through hard work that they achieved success.

sentences.kr: 이 프로젝트를 성공으로 이끈 것은 바로 팀워크였습니다.
sentences.en: It was teamwork that led this project to success.

sentences.kr: 우리가 중점을 두어야 할 것은 바로 고객 만족입니다.
sentences.en: It is customer satisfaction that we should focus on.

sentences.kr: 회사의 성장을 이끈 것은 바로 혁신이었습니다.
sentences.en: It was innovation that drove the company's growth.

sentences.kr: 우리가 투자해야 할 것은 바로 기술 개발입니다.
sentences.en: It is technology development that we must invest in.

sentences.kr: 이 결정을 내린 것은 바로 CEO였습니다.
sentences.en: It was the CEO that made this decision.
